Message:
Sol is always there to save me.
That’s why this time,
I wanted to be the one
to save her.

But, everything I did
only made her sad...

I even went so far
as to hurt her...

I can’t even save
my precious little sister...

but then Sol pulled
something out of her bag.

This is the bear I gave
you for your birthday...

Have you...held onto it
this entire time...?
Sol gives me a warm smile.

“Thank you for always
saving me, Big Sis.”

I won’t ever leave
you alone again.

I love you more
than anything, Sol!
